languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, на мире Фолстоун конфликт между верующими Ордена Молота и беженцами из владений династии Винтерскейл. У склепа подвижника Никомедаса Кифы разразился спор, и в ходе потасовки склеп был поврежден. Пилигримы, почитающие соперника Кифы, Филопимена Мальпийского, утверждали, что Кифа — вор, расхищавший реликвии святого Когнация и тревоживший священную тайну его захоронения ради жажды наживы. Орден Молота в ярости от кощунственных заявлений и осквернения захоронения подвижника".

"Lord Captain, the world of Foulstone has been upset by a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the renowned holy man Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and violated the sacred mystery of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of Keefe's burial site."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, на мире Фолстоун конфликт между верующими Ордена Молота и беженцами из владений династии Винтерскейл. У склепа подвижника Никомедаса Кифы разразился спор, и в ходе потасовки склеп был поврежден. Пилигримы, почитающие соперника Кифы, Филопимена Мальпийского, утверждали, что Кифа — вор, расхищавший реликвии святого Когнация и тревоживший священную тайну его захоронения ради жажды наживы. Орден Молота в ярости от кощунственных заявлений и осквернения захоронения подвижника".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, there is a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domains. An argument broke out near the tomb of the ascetic Nicomedas Cephas, and the tomb got damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering the Cephas's rival, Philopimenes of Malfi, have claimed Cephas to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and disturbing the sacrament of his resting place to sate his greed. The Orden of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of the ascetic's burial site."

languages.text: “舰长大人，荒寂岩地的居民惴惴不安，因为重锤修会的追随者和来自温特斯凯尔领地的难民之间爆发了冲突。他们在赫赫有名的圣人尼科梅迪斯·基弗的坟墓附近发生了争执，坟墓在这一过程中遭到了损坏。那些朝圣者们崇拜基弗的宿敌，马尔皮的菲洛匹厄斯。他们声称基弗是个小偷，说基弗受到贪婪的诱惑，盗走了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物，还破坏了安息之地的圣礼。这些异端言论和亵渎基弗墓地的恶行让重锤修会非常愤怒。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the world of Foulstone has been upset by a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the renowned holy man Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and violated the sacred mystery of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of Keefe's burial site."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，荒寂岩地的居民惴惴不安，因为重锤修会的追随者和来自温特斯凯尔领地的难民之间爆发了冲突。他们在赫赫有名的圣人尼科梅迪斯·基弗的坟墓附近发生了争执，坟墓在这一过程中遭到了损坏。那些朝圣者们崇拜基弗的宿敌，马尔皮的菲洛匹厄斯。他们声称基弗是个小偷，说基弗受到贪婪的诱惑，盗走了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物，还破坏了安息之地的圣礼。这些异端言论和亵渎基弗墓地的恶行让重锤修会非常愤怒。”
“舰长大人，重锤修会的追随者和来自温特斯凯尔领地的难民之间爆发了冲突。他们在苦行僧尼科米达斯·基弗的坟墓附近发生了争执，坟墓在这一过程中遭到了损坏。那些朝圣者们崇拜基弗的宿敌，马尔皮的菲洛匹厄斯。他们声称基弗是一个小偷，说基弗受到贪婪的诱惑，盗走了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物，还扰乱了安息之地的圣礼。这些异端言论和对亵渎墓地的恶行让重锤修会非常愤怒。”
“舰长大人，重锤修会的追随者和来自温特斯凯尔领地的难民之间爆发了冲突。他们在苦行僧尼科梅迪斯·基弗的坟墓附近发生了争执，坟墓在这一过程中遭到了损坏。那些朝圣者们崇拜基弗的宿敌，马尔皮的菲洛匹厄斯。他们声称基弗是一个小偷，说基弗受到贪婪的诱惑，盗走了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物，还扰乱了安息之地的圣礼。这些异端言论和对亵渎墓地的恶行让重锤修会非常愤怒。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hay un conflicto entre los seguidores de la Orden del Martillo y los refugiados de los dominios de la dinastía Winterscale en el mundo de Rocainmunda. Se produjo una discusión cerca de la tumba del venerable santo Nicomedes Keefe, que quedó dañada en la pelea resultante. Los peregrinos que adoraban al rival de Keefe, Filopimenes de Malpi, insisten en que Keefe era un ladrón que robó las reliquias de san Cognatius y violó el misterio sagrado de su lugar de descanso para satisfacer su codicia. La Orden del Martillo está furiosa ante estas injurias heréticas y la profanación de la tumba de Keefe».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the world of Foulstone has been upset by a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the renowned holy man Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and violated the sacred mystery of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of Keefe's burial site."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hay un conflicto entre los seguidores de la Orden del Martillo y los refugiados de los dominios de la dinastía Winterscale en el mundo de Rocainmunda. Se produjo una discusión cerca de la tumba del venerable santo Nicomedes Keefe, que quedó dañada en la pelea resultante. Los peregrinos que adoraban al rival de Keefe, Filopimenes de Malpi, insisten en que Keefe era un ladrón que robó las reliquias de san Cognatius y violó el misterio sagrado de su lugar de descanso para satisfacer su codicia. La Orden del Martillo está furiosa ante estas injurias heréticas y la profanación de la tumba de Keefe».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、フットフォールに鉄槌の修道会の信者とウィンタースケール王朝の領地出身の難民との間で紛争が起きています。修道士ニコメダス・キーフの墓の近くで口論が起こり、その争いで墓が破損しました。キーフと敵対関係であるマルピのフィロピメーネスを崇める巡礼者は、キーフが聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を盗み、欲望を満たそうとその安息地の秘跡を乱したと主張しています。そのため、鉄槌の修道会は、異端的な発言とキーフの埋葬地を冒涜したことに激怒しているのです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the world of Foulstone has been upset by a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the renowned holy man Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and violated the sacred mystery of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of Keefe's burial site."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、鉄槌の修道会の信者とウィンタースケール王朝の領地出身の難民との間で紛争が起きています。修道士ニコメダス・セファスの墓の近くで口論が起こり、その争いで墓が破損しました。セファと敵対関係であるマルピのフィロピメーネスを崇める巡礼者は、セファが聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を盗み、欲望を満たそうとその安息地の秘跡を乱したと主張しています。そのため、鉄槌の修道会は、異端的な発言と修道士の埋葬地を冒涜したことに激怒しているのです」

「ロード・キャプテン、鉄槌の修道会の信者とウィンタースケール王朝の領地出身の難民との間で紛争が起きています。修道士ニコメダス・セファスの墓の近くで口論が起こり、その争いで墓が破損しました。セファと敵対関係であるマルピのフィロピメーネスを崇める巡礼者は、セファが聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を盗み、欲望を満たそうとその安息地の秘跡を乱したと主張しています。そのため、鉄槌の修道会は、異端的な発言と修道士の埋葬地を冒涜したことに激怒しているのです」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, Rochepeste a été ébranlée par un conflit opposant les adeptes de l'Ordre du Marteau aux réfugiés du domaine de la dynastie Winterscale. Une échauffourée a éclaté près de la tombe de Nicomède Keefe, et le lieu saint a été endommagé. Les pèlerins vénèrent le rival de Céphas, Philopimène de Malpi, et prétendent que le premier est un voleur, qui a dérobé les reliques de Saint Cognatius et violé le caractère sacré de sa sépulture afin d'assouvir sa seule cupidité. Ces déclarations hérétiques et la profanation du tombeau de Keefe ont provoqué l'ire de l'Ordre du Marteau. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the world of Foulstone has been upset by a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the renowned holy man Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and violated the sacred mystery of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of Keefe's burial site."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, Rochepeste a été ébranlée par un conflit opposant les adeptes de l'Ordre du Marteau aux réfugiés du domaine de la dynastie Winterscale. Une échauffourée a éclaté près de la tombe de Nicomède Keefe, et le lieu saint a été endommagé. Les pèlerins vénèrent le rival de Céphas, Philopimène de Malpi, et prétendent que le premier est un voleur, qui a dérobé les reliques de Saint Cognatius et violé le caractère sacré de sa sépulture afin d'assouvir sa seule cupidité. Ces déclarations hérétiques et la profanation du tombeau de Keefe ont provoqué l'ire de l'Ordre du Marteau. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die Welt Foulstone leidet unter einem Konflikt zwischen den Anhängern des Ordens des Hammers und den Flüchtlingen aus dem Reich der Winterzunder-Dynastie. Unweit des Grabes des bekannten Heiligen Nicodemes Keefe kam es zu einem Streit, in dessen Verlauf das Grab selbst beschädigt wurde. Die Pilger, die Keefes Rivalen Philopimenes von Malpi verehren, halten Keefes für einen Dieb, der die Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius gestohlen hat. Sie sagen, er habe das heilige Mysterium seiner ' Ruhestätte gestört, um sich zu bereichern. Der Orden des Hammers ist erzürnt über diese ketzerischen Behauptungen und die Entweihung von Keefes Grabstätte."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the world of Foulstone has been upset by a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the renowned holy man Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and violated the sacred mystery of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of Keefe's burial site."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die Welt Foulstone leidet unter einem Konflikt zwischen den Anhängern des Ordens des Hammers und den Flüchtlingen aus dem Reich der Winterzunder-Dynastie. Unweit des Grabes des bekannten Heiligen Nicodemes Keefe kam es zu einem Streit, in dessen Verlauf das Grab selbst beschädigt wurde. Die Pilger, die Keefes Rivalen Philopimenes von Malpi verehren, halten Keefes für einen Dieb, der die Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius gestohlen hat. Sie sagen, er habe das heilige Mysterium seiner ' Ruhestätte gestört, um sich zu bereichern. Der Orden des Hammers ist erzürnt über diese ketzerischen Behauptungen und die Entweihung von Keefes Grabstätte."

"Lord Captain, es besteht ein Konflikt zwischen den Anhängern des Ordens des Hammers und den Flüchtlingen aus dem Reich der Winterzunder-Dynastie. In der Nähe des Grabs des Asketen Nicomedas Cephas ist ein Streit ausgebrochen, in dessen Verlauf das Grab beschädigt wurde. Die Pilger, die Cephas' Rivalen Philopimenes von Malpi verehren, halten Cephas für einen Dieb, der die Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius gestohlen hat. Sie sagen, er habe das Sakrament von Cognatius' Ruhestätte gestört, nur um sich zu bereichern. Der Orden des Hammers ist erzürnt über diese ketzerischen Behauptungen und die Entweihung der Grabstätte des Asketen."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Binliman dünyasında Çekiç Tarikatı müritleri ile Winterscale hanedanlığının topraklarından gelen mülteciler arasında bir anlaşmazlık çıkmış. Ünlü din adamı Nicomedes Keefe'nin kabrinin yakınlarında bir tartışma patlak vermiş ve mücadele esnasında kabir hasar görmüş. Keefe'nin rakibi Malpili Philopimenes'i ilah olarak gören Hacılar, Keefe'nin Aziz Cognatius'un yadigârlarını çalan bir hırsız olduğunu ve tamahkârlığını doyurmak adına kabrinin kutsal saklılığına zarar verdiğini iddia ediyorlar. Çekiç Tarikatı, kâfirce iddialar ve Keefe'nin kabristanına gösterilen hürmetsizlik karşısında öfkeden deliye dönmüş hâlde."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the world of Foulstone has been upset by a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the renowned holy man Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and violated the sacred mystery of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of Keefe's burial site."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Binliman dünyasında Çekiç Tarikatı müritleri ile Winterscale hanedanlığının topraklarından gelen mülteciler arasında bir anlaşmazlık çıkmış. Ünlü din adamı Nicomedes Keefe'nin kabrinin yakınlarında bir tartışma patlak vermiş ve mücadele esnasında kabir hasar görmüş. Keefe'nin rakibi Malpili Philopimenes'i ilah olarak gören Hacılar, Keefe'nin Aziz Cognatius'un yadigârlarını çalan bir hırsız olduğunu ve tamahkârlığını doyurmak adına kabrinin kutsal saklılığına zarar verdiğini iddia ediyorlar. Çekiç Tarikatı, kâfirce iddialar ve Keefe'nin kabristanına gösterilen hürmetsizlik karşısında öfkeden deliye dönmüş hâlde."
